sub_title: Storyteller in love with business, digital marketing strategy & filmmaking | MA Media & Business
summary:
I believe good stories are memorable, and great stories powerful. Sharing stories has the power to empathize with people, make an impact in society, but also help in every phase of business management. Becoming a producer and making people's stories tangible has always been my dream. However, my curiosity drawn me to marketing and I fell in love with business. 

Think we should work together? Interested in grabbing a coffee and talking all things marketing and storytelling? Please feel free to send an email my way.

Diplome pour tout l'équipe du K-Fard.

awards.title: Mentions spéciale catégorie collège « Le tour du Monde de Thalassa et les lycées français du grand large »: "Le Pérou, acteur modeste du commerce international"
awards.description:
Concours catégorie collège «Le tour du Monde de Thalassa et les lycées français du grand large»

Dans le cadre de la série exceptionnelle d'émissions «Le tour du monde de Thalassa» diffusées sur France 3 et TV5 du 28 septembre au 28 décembre 2007, les classes de collège et de lycée du réseau étaient appelées à constituer un dossier témoignant de leur regard propre sur la mondialisation.
Au départ, près de 80 dossiers ont été présentés, les établissements ont présélectionné les meilleurs d’entre eux pour ne retenir qu’un dossier collège et un dossier lycée par établissement.
43 productions émanant de 35 pays sur les 5 continents ont été soumises à un jury qui a récompensé les meilleurs dossiers parmi les 18 réalisations des classes de collège et les 25 réalisations de classes de lycées.

Lycée Franco-Péruvien de Lima - PEROU -  "Le Pérou, acteur modeste du commerce international"
Laura Mantilla et Charline Gesbert

http://goo.gl/DlPvi
awards.issuer: Agence pour l'enseignement français à l'étranger (AEFE)

courses.name: Management of Audiovisual and Interactive Production

profile_positions.description: DOTCOM is a strategic consultancy agency for lead generation. We use technology to generate leads in an organized and systematic way using marketing automation.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & COO

profile_positions.description:
Plot Media Work is an audiovisual production start up looking for millennial empowerment in the Peruvian audiovisual industry. We know that Content is King, however, talent is the key to success. If you want the best performing content, you need a talented crew to produce it.

If you are a medium to small company, or a start-up, you probably won't be able to spend the same amount of money as a multinational company, but you still need amazing content to promote yourself. Here is were Plot Media Work comes to play a part. We do quality work at a fair, competitive price while having passionate and creative millennials doing the work.

• Oversaw client acquisition and management.
• Responsible for creating digital marketing strategies, proposals, and budgets for audiovisual production.
• Managed the pre-production process and participated as assistant director fo Rockstars, an independent short film. (Budget: 1000 euros)
profile_positions.title: Executive Producer

profile_positions.description: The official consultative participation body that primarily engages in education and consists of five student and five staff members that advises the programme management about all aspects of the education programme (Bachelor and Master) including structure and organization of the programmes, the quality of education, the content of the programmes, and the Teaching and Examination Regulations.
profile_positions.title: Student Representative in the Media & Communication Programme Committee
Consultant for the International Consultancy Project - ICP

profile_positions.description:
Dotcom Ventures is a digital marketing / digital transformation consulting agency. I started there as an intern, took on more responsibility as Digital Marketing Manager and, as of today, I currently work as an account executive and became my mentor's business partner. 

• Oversaw client acquisition and management
• Generated actionable insights on consumer behavior which led to the design and implementation of an e-commerce platform specialized in beauty (retail).
• Advised clients to embrace digital transformation and help them understand inbound marketing and omnichannel marketing

The most important thing is to help the client optimize their assets to have the most successful digital campaign. Everything is done with a customer-centric focus.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
• Planned and executed omnichannel marketing campaigns: email marketing, customer journeys, automation and social Media.
• Worked hand in hand with the clients to improve their marketing and commercial strategy and figure out the marketing mix
• Grew different communities on Facebook for different clients and brands on retail (e.g. hairdressing chain / spa from 7K to 18K, aesthetic clinic from 0 to 10K).
• Handled branding and re-branding (graphic design, media production, and content marketing) or different clients.
• Supervised web developing projects from design to content management using e-commerce platforms (Shopify, Prestashop) and CMS (Wordpress, Joomla).
• Oversaw audiovisual production of media content: budgets, locations, script, editing, post-production, filming, and photography.
• Delivered reports & analytics
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Handled social media accounts (media content production and copywriting)
• Oversaw quality control of web design implementation (graphic design focused)
• Community Management
• Photography and videography for social media
• Social Media Strategy strategy and planning
• Delivered KPI reports
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer and Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
VBOUT is an all-in-one marketing automation platform. The company is based in New York. Lima is a strategic sport for the Latin-American region.

• Oversaw client acquisition and client management.
• Organized a marketing workshop with Richard Fallah (CEO of VBOUT) as main speaker to introduce the platform to the Peruvian market.
• Trained new clients on the use of the VBOUT platform: both leading on-boarding sessions in Spanish or translating and co-leading the sessions.
• Trained junior colleges and interns in the usage of the platform and best practices for digital marketing strategies.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Nómade Films is a film producing company based in Lima (Peru) focused on documentary films and TV series production.

• Performed a content analysis of the press and sales material of "The Unseen", proposed and redesigned them for distribution.
• Designed the pitching material for a TV Series proposal by the Peruvian director, Judith Velez.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
Grupo Thesca (formerly Thesca Producciones) is a company that produced the TV Show "Aquí Lima Norte" and organizes workshops on leadership and entrepreneurship. The show aired once a week on Alfa TV by Cable Perú (a cable provider for Lima's northern districts). 

My responsibilities during my internship there were:
• Help the production manager to plan the episodes
• Look for and contact new entrepreneurs for next week's episode
• Sell advertising spaces on the show
• Look for possible new sponsorships for the show
• Supervise and help the crew during the shooting of the show (exteriors & interviews)
• Graphic design
• Photography and videography at coaching events
profile_positions.title: Production Assistant

profile_positions.description: Worked as an assistant producer for the Amazing Race LatinAmerica Edition, Episodes 3 and 4, when the contestants were in Peru.
profile_positions.title: Production Assistant
